Investing Blog Roundup: 2024 Bogleheads Conference Videos

The videos from the 2024 Bogleheads Conference are now available. You can find them at the links below. Note that “Bogleheads University” is the first day of the conference, which is split up into “101” and “501” tracks to provide more entry-level information for those who need it, while still having a separate advanced track so that the more experienced attendees can get some new, useful information as well.

  • 2024 Bogleheads University
  • 2024 Bogleheads Conference

As far as sessions in which I personally was involved, there’s:

  • My talk Roth Conversions: a Deep Dive,
  • The Financial Planning Experts Panel (with Christine Benz, Jon Luskin, Carolyn McClanahan, and Harry Sit, moderated by Karen Damato), and
  • The Ask Us Anything Experts Panel (with Christine Benz, Bill Bernstein, Rick Ferri, and Allan Roth).

Other Recommended Reading

  • Don’t Invest in ‘Too Good to Be True’ — Lessons Learned from an Alleged Ponzi Scheme from Jim Dahle
  • Fund Providers Flock to Vanguard’s ETF Share Class from Daniel Sotiroff
  • Vanguard to Offer New Short-Term Liquidity ETFs from Vanguard
  • US Markets Are Swallowing the Rest of the World from Ben Carlson
  • Retire Without Regrets from Teresa Amabile, Lotte Bailyn, Marcy Crary, Douglas Hall, and Kathy Kram
  • Financial Planning for Special Needs Kids with Dr. Bryan Jepson from Jim Dahle
  • What Are Hospice and Palliative Care, and What’s the Difference? (Healthcare Triage video)
  • Court Halts BOI Reporting; AICPA Urges Preparedness from Martha Waggoner

Thanks for reading!
